observation: TaxWatch Canada  Home Bookkeeping & Tax Services Late Tax Filing Service Business Investment Loss Claims Tax Debt Consulting Incorporation Service Corporate Tax Planning and Tax Savings Publications Blog Testimonials FAQ Client Centre Contact Us Canada-Wide Specialized Tax & Professional Services CANADA WIDE TAX HELP LINE: 1-877-800-9343 EXPERIENCE THE ADVANTAGE Our Services TaxWatch Canada specializes in numerous situation- based tax services for individual and small business clients. We offer optimized results for an affordable price. Bookkeeping & Tax Filing Late Tax Filing (Personal & Business) Loss/ABIL Claims About Us TaxWatch Canada's consultants, accountants, tax specialists and available legal representatives were brought together to assist Canadians in challenging tax situations that demands specialized expertise, experience and knowledge. Our  knowledge of Canada Revenue Agency (CRA) procedures and policies and  our contacts within CRA allows us to offer services based not only on  what has worked in the past, but on carefully considered and efficient customized actions. We watch out for you The Advantage Our  advantage (your advantage) is our experience with thousands of tax and  business situations and our assistance that provides a step by step  approach. Step by step is important because you need only commit  resources and costs as each issue is addressed or the process evolves  (e.g. facts are reviewed and options provided first).    Although each  situation is unique, in many instances we know how CRA is likely to  perceive and react to your situation. That is why we always engage CRA  quite amicably (but directly) and seek to work, as the process evolves,  with the specific CRA official assigned to your file. Consider TaxWatch  as a first responder on the scene, taking control of the situation for  you. Contact Us for a Free Consultation Meet the Founder Ken Lagasse is a senior tax specialist and founder at TaxWatch Canada. With over 45 years experience, Ken has been involved with many client and personal business, tax and financial situations and has a sense of what is likely to be the best approach to take. Ken and TaxWatch Canada’s priority is assisting clients by offering a down to earth, positive and explanatory style of professional practice. All impediments can be reduced with a step by step approach and a plan. That is part of the TaxWatch Canada advantage. Experience dictates we respond quickly and effectively to assessments, questionnaires, correspondence, demands and inquiries from CRA. You have to steer the process in the direction best suited to the most favourable outcome for you. That means timing considerations, credibility (keeping commitments), filing positions (varied), and detailed, supported, compelling arguments must always be foremost. In any situation, you must seek the advantage and take the actions that have the best possibility of providing the best outcomes. We help our clients succeed or overcome obstacles in the most realistic and effective extent possible. Don't just take our word for it. See what others have to say.. Happy Clients TaxWatch has created several publications; venture into real-world tax, business and financial know-how: Ken’s Comments: CRA Does Not Like To Be Ignored True Story A Canadian corporation had sales over 1.5 million for one recent year but is now inactive. Trigger was pulled by CRA; this sales level automatically required the corporation to file GST quarterly (rather than annually). CRA sent notice of this requirement mid-year. Next, 4 days later, CRA issued high notional (estimated) assessments for GST for the first two quarters. Just like that. here Canada Wide Service We work with clients all over Canada Let’s talk! thought: The content on the website does not exhibit any of the characteristics of a scam website. There are no unusually low prices, claims of free, psychological manipulation, or non-existent company information. The website also handles professional services rather than products, and the contact information seems appropriate for business use. Additionally, the information appears to be updated and relevant. Therefore, based on the analysis, the website https://taxwatchcanada.com/ does not appear to be a scam. {

observation.reason: The website does not exhibit any characteristics of a scam website such as unusually low prices psychological manipulation or non-existent company information. It provides professional services and the contact information seems appropriate for business use. The information is also updated and relevant.
